name: Beekeepers with Guns
description:
This Game is a little 2D-Platformer, where you protect a growing Beehive from other Insects. Made for the KenneyJam 2022.

Used Assets by www.kenney.nl:

- Pixel Line Platformer (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-line-platformer).

- Board Game icons (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/board-game-icons).

- Impact Sounds (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/impact-sounds)
